params._token: Address of the token contract (address(0) for native ETH)

returns._0: Whether the nonce has been processed

params.to: Starknet address to receive tokens on target chain

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._otherChainContract: Address of contract on other chain

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.signature: Signature from the user who locked tokens
params.sourceChainId: Chain ID where tokens were locked

addLiquidity(uint256).notice: Add liquidity to the contract (owner only)

authorizedRelayers(address).notice: Mapping of authorized relayers who can execute unlock operations

emergencyTokenRecovery(address,uint256).notice: Emergency function to recover tokens sent by mistake

isNonceProcessed(address,uint256).notice: Check if a nonce has been processed for a user

lockedBalances(address).notice: Mapping to track user locked balances

otherChainContract().notice: Contract address on the other chain for verification

processedNonces(address,uint256).notice: Mapping to track processed nonces to prevent replay attacks

removeLiquidity(uint256).notice: Remove liquidity from the contract (owner only)

setOtherChainContract(bytes32).notice: Set the other chain contract address

token().notice: The token contract (address(0) for native ETH)

totalLocked().notice: Total locked amount in the contract

unlockTokens(address,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Unlock tokens on this chain using signed message from source chain
